message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify spending up to $9500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9800. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
